Descriptions.ShortDescription: AI-powered assistant for astrophotography with multi-provider support
Descriptions.LongDescription: Powerful multi-provider AI assistant for NINA with MCP equipment control. Supports GitHub Models (free), OpenAI, Anthropic Claude, Google Gemini, Ollama (local), and OpenRouter. Version 1.0.0.4 features updated AI models (GPT-4o, Claude Sonnet 4, Gemini 2.0), enhanced MCP logging, and bug fixes. Provides 40+ MCP tools for camera, mount, focuser, filter wheel, guider, and dome control.
